input.sentences: the ocean has been dissipating off the coast for years now .
from it we got a lot more beach .
enough beach to actually walk on . this used to be all water .
the fence used to indicate deep water but now just looks like a normal fence .
you could even see boats once sunken on the shore .
output.sentences: The ocean has many pretty sights.
There is always a lot of water at the beach.
Some people enjoy walking along the water when they visit the beach.
When the tides are high, sometimes they reach the fence.
Occasionally you find something unique, like sunken boats that have washed up along the shore.
